title: Eagle Mountain (Kooh e Oqab)
content: Eagle mountain is a type of erosion forms which has formed in the limes of Jurassic and Cretaceous. Eagle mountain is located near the entrance of the Tait town in Yazd province. From the East, the landscape of this mountain looks like an Eagle body.

gallery.caption: ER1-2 :A landscape of Oqab (Eagle) Mountain From Taft town
ER1-3 :A view of Oqab Mountain from behind
ER1-4 :A close view of Oqab Mountain
